title: Gim Rep√∫blica del Oeste
description: Full-stack project plataform administration for local Gim. This project is in production and is used by the Gim to manage their clients, subscriptions, payments, and classes.

title: Cardiovascular Disease Prediction
description: Machine Learning project to predict cardiovascular disease using Bagging and Ensemble methods.

title: Text analysis for mental health and sign language detection
description: Sentiment analysis for mental health with NPL using RandomForrest algorithm and American Sign Language images detection with Deep Learning using basic neuronal network with TensorFlow.

title: Web Scraping Challenge
description: Automatic Scrapping challenge with Python and selenium driver.

title: Ecommerce with Dyango
description: Example Ecommerce web plataform using pure Python with Dyango.

title: Rag App local
description: Rag app totally local using tools and model from Ollama, LangChain and Milvus as vector DB. It comes with a simple React frontend and FastAPI Backend with Python for Q/A the model.

title: Full Stack Ecommerce
description: Full Stack project with MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS) for an Ecommerce web plataform. It includes user authentication, product management, and a shopping cart.

title: Votation Dapp
description: Decentralized Votation App using HardHat framework for smart contracts. It includes a React frontend that interacts with the Ethereum blockchain via MetaMask.

title: Document Signer Dapp
description: Decentralized Document Signer App using Truffle framework for smart contracts. It includes a React frontend that interacts with the Ethereum blockchain via MetaMask.

title: Lottery Smart Contract
description: Full stack Lottery contract with Brownie framework. It includes a React frontend that interacts with the backend in ExpressJS for interact with the contract.
